answers.answer: Yup happens to me ,I used to be able to eat anything and before pregnancy loved veggies ,but i the other day I tried eating a pepper I couldn't even finish because I started gagging . Its lovely to see what foods you start hating that you loved and what foods you now love that you hated haha
Sushi :( shrimp.... (its all cooked and some seafood is okay, one serving a week)Icecream... sigh.
Yep most of the time i dont get to eat hardly anything i want
The worst is puking up a steak. Omgosh!  #worstfeelingever
Even worse having gestational diabetes.  I can't eat anything I want lol.

question: Have you ever started eating your favorite food and then just throw up?So yesterday I was eating pineapples I got.finished with one and iI started throwing up I was like no this is so unfair I love you babe I will be able to eat you soon
title: unfair
